alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 04 at 9:53PM PST until February 05 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Douglas County and Eastern Douglas County Foothills. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Douglas County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills
